content:
BuildSettings Enum

Definition

Specifies the settings for a build.

In this Article

[System.Flags]
public enum BuildSettings
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
BuildSettings

Fields

DoNotResetPreviouslyBuiltTargets

Specifies that no important external state has changed and no previously built targets should be rebuilt.
None

Specifies that the build should run normally.
